title: Jonathan Chait Rips Naomi Klein's Climate Change Book
text:
Jonathan Chait Rips Naomi Klein's Climate Change Book New York Magazine Posted: 10/24/2015 04:02 PM EDT | Edited: 1 hour ago Cole Bennetts via Getty Images 
One of the hardiest and most irresistible political fallacies holds that, if your sideâ€™s agenda is failing, it has failed only because weak-kneed leaders have presented to the public a compromised version.
